title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Supermoon Tower - ETH Denver | March  1-3, 2023 | Clock Tower, Denver, ColoradoEvent Website: https://www.supermooncamp.com/supermoon-tower-denverA 3-day event at the historic Clock Tower in downtown Denver that will gather 1500+ founders, builders and investors. This event will feature open microphone podcasts, workshops, interviews, and networking breaks and evening social hour.Each day is filled with engaging opportunities, from a morning coffee and open microphone podcast, to workshops, interviews, and networking breaks. And let's not forget the evening social hour, a perfect time to unwind and mingle with like-minded individuals.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Supermoon Will Host A 3-Day Event At The Most Iconic Building during ETH Denver https://bitcoingarden.org/supermoon-will-host-a-3-day-event-at-the-most-iconic-building-during-eth-denver/ Supermoon is coming to ETH Denver with its 3-day event at the Denver Clock Tower from March 1st through the 3rd, from 12:00 pm until 11:00 pm daily, featuring panel discussions, workshops, and social networking events all while enjoying beautiful views of Denver.Supermoon Tower will welcome selected founders, builders, and investors to this special and intimate networking event. The first day (March 1st) will kick off with the Talent Protocol brunch, followed by a series of talks and discussions leading up to the exclusive Native Soiree, brought to you by Native. Native is an infrastructure layer that turns exchanges into a feature, rather than a standalone app, enabling projects to launch their own DEX in just a few minutes.On the second day, March 2, the day will start with the Supermoon members-only coffee hour and Open Microphone Podcast. During the podcast, Supermoon members will have the opportunity to share their opinions on current events in crypto and web3. Supermoon Tower Startup Day will start at 1:00 pm. Selected startups showcasing their projects in front of VC funds and investors, along with Techstars, Supermoon’s special partner....
